1061:1: yataścaivaṃ samanantarātikrāntaprakaraṇavidhinā svaparobhayakṛtatvamahetusamutpanatvaṃ ca nirūpyamāṇaṃ bhāvānāmasat,
1061:3: utpannarūpatvena caite bhāvā avidyātimiropahatamatinayanānāṃ bālapṛthagjanānāṃ khyānti,
1061:4: tasmānniḥsvabhāvā eva santo bālānāṃ visaṃvādakā māyākarituragādivat tadanabhijñānāṃ na tu vijñānām |
1061:5: ata eva sarvadharmasvābhāvāvyāparokṣadhīnayanaḥ samunmūlitāśeṣā vidyāvāsanaḥ caturviparyāsaviparyastātrāṇasattvaparitrāṇāya aviparītanaiḥ svābhāvyopadeśatatparo buddho jagadvibodhako mahākāruṇikaḥ -
1061:7: sarve ca moṣadharmāṇaḥ saṃskārāstena te mṛṣā ||1||
1061:8: sūtre uktam- tanmṛṣā moṣadharma yadidaṃ saṃskṛtam |
1061:9: etaddhi khalu bhikṣavaḥ paramaṃ satyaṃ yadidamamoṣadharma nirvāṇam |
1061:14: tadanena nyāyena yanmoṣadharma tanmṛṣetyevaṃ yasmāduktavāṃstathāgato bhagavān,
1061:16: tasmānmoṣadharmakatvena te saṃskārā mṛṣā bhavanti citrakarayantradārikāvat,
1061:19: ato niḥsvabhāvatvena mṛṣā sarvasaṃskārāḥ moṣadharmakatvāt marīcikādijalavat |
1061:22: tataśca vihitayā upapattyā asmāccāgamāt siddhaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ naiḥsvābhāvyam |
1061:23: śūnyāḥ sarvadharmā niḥsvabhāvayogena iti ca prajñāpāramitā-ardhaśatikāpāṭhāt ||1||
1061:24: atrāha - yadyevaṃ moṣadharmakatvena sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ mṛṣātvaṃ pratipāditaṃ bhavatā,
1061:25: nanvevaṃ sati na santi sarve bhāvā iti sarvapadārthāpavādinī mithyādṛṣṭireva syāt |
1061:30: tanmṛṣā moṣadharma yadyadi kiṃ tatra muṣyate |
1061:43: tanna bhāvānāmabhāvaparidīpakam kiṃ tarhi śūnyatāparidīpakam svabhāvānutpādaparidīpakamityarthaḥ |
1061:57: etaduktaṃ bhavati - yadi bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo na syāt,
1061:62: asvabhāvo bhāvo nāsti bhāvānāṃ śūnyatā yataḥ ||3||
1061:65: na ca asati dharmiṇi tadāśrito dharma upapadyate |
1061:66: na hi asati vandhyātanaye tacchayāmatopapadyata iti |
1061:75: iha yo dharmo yaṃ padārthaṃ na vyabhicarati,
1061:78: agnerauṣṇyaṃ hi loke tadavyabhicāritvāt svabhāva ityucyate |
1061:83: evaṃ bhāvānāṃ sati svabhāvābhyupagame'nyathātvameva na saṃbhavet |
1061:86: api ca | ayamanyathābhāvo bhāvānāṃ naiva saṃbhavati,
1061:91: yuvā na jīryate yasmādyasmājjīrṇo na jīryate ||5||
1061:92: tasyaiva tāvat prāgvat prāgavasthāyāṃ vartamānasya bhāvasyānyathātvaṃ nopapadyate |
1061:93: tathā hi yūno yuvāvasthāyāmeva vartamānasya nāsti anyathātvam |
1061:102: kiṃ hi jīrṇasya punarjarayā saṃbandhaḥ kuryāt?
1061:103: tadāgamanāntareṇa jīrṇatābhāvā jjīrṇo jīryata iti na yujyate |
1061:113: yadi kṣīraṃ dadhi bhavatīti neṣyate parasparavirodhāt -
1061:117: tadevamanyathātvāsaṃbhavāt kutastaddarśanāt sasvabhāvatā bhāvānāṃ prasetsyatīti na yuktametat |
1061:119: yo na pi jāyati no cupapadyī
1061:120: no cyavate na pi jīryati dharmaḥ |
1061:140: yaṃ pi vadesi na vidyati taṃ pi |
1061:159: na kiṃcidastyaśūnyaṃ ca kutaḥ śūnyaṃ bhaviṣyati ||7||
1061:163: iha hi śūnyatā nāmeti sarvadharmāṇāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇamityabhyupagamāt aśūnyadharmābhāvādaśūnyataiva nāsti |
1061:164: yadā ca aśūnyāḥ padārthā na santi,
1061:168: tadātadāśrayā api padārthā na santīti sthitamavikalam ||7||
1061:169: atrāha - trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitākhyāni vimuktaye vineyebhyo bhagavatā nirdiṣṭāni sarvatīrthikasamayāsādhāraṇāni saugata eva pravacane samupalabhyante |
1061:171: sa bhavāṃstathāgatapravacanavyākhyānavyājena idānīṃ tāmeva śūnyatāṃ pratikṣeptumārabdhavān,
1061:174: aho vata bhavānatyunmukha iva atyantaviparyāsānnirvāṇapuragāminaṃ śivamṛjuṃ paramaṃ panthānamavadhūya bhāvābhiniveśavyā,
1061:175: kulitaṃ saṃsārakāntārānugameva mārgaṃ mokṣapuragāmitvena samāśrito nirmumukṣuḥ san saṃsārāṭavīkāntāraḥ sadbhirupālabhya eva san abhimānābhiniveśagrahapavaraśatayā tānevopālabhate |
1061:179: iha sarveṣāmeva dṛṣṭikṛtānāṃ sarvagrahābhiniveśānāṃ yaniḥsaraṇamapravṛttiḥ sā śūnyatā |
1061:182: tān prati avācakā vayamiti kuto'smadupadeśāt sakalakalpanāvyāvṛttyā mokṣo bhaviṣyati?
1061:184: sa cet ' dehi bhostadeva mahyaṃ nakiṃcinnāma paṇyam,
1061:188: kenedānīṃ sa teṣāṃ tasyāṃ bhāvābhiniveśo niṣidhyatāmiti?
1061:189: ato mahābhaiṣajye'pi doṣasaṃjñitvāt paramacikitsakairmahāvaidyaistathāgataiḥ pratyākhyātā eva te |
1061:199: ye hi kāśyapa śūnyatopalambhena śūnyatāṃ pratisaranti,
1061:211: tasya tadbhaiṣajyaṃ sarvadoṣānuccārya svayaṃ koṣṭhagataṃ na niḥsaret |
1061:212: tatkiṃ manyase kāśyapa api tu sa puruṣastato glānyānmukto bhavet?
1061:215: yasya tadbhaiṣajyaṃ sarvadoṣānuccārya koṣṭhagataṃ na niḥsaret |
